bibliography:

Oxford: Oxford University Press, pp. 224–254.

principle”, Synthese, 89: 189–227.

–––, 1993, “Quantum chaos and
semiclassical mechanics”, in PSA 1992 (Volume 2),

–––, 1995, “Theories between theories:

–––, 2002, The Devil in the Details:

–––, 2012 “The Tyranny of Scales,”

Belot, Gordon, 2005, “Whose Devil? Which
Details?,” Philosophy of Science, 72:

–––, 1991, “Asymptotics, singularities and
